Posts.Content: I've gotten this myself, it comes and goes. Never crossed my mind to worry too much about it. I use Apple Cider Vinegar on a piece of cotton make-up pad. It burned for about 30seconds, but it sure did make the itching go away. I'm on hormone replacement therapy and thyroid meds. I just figured it was my hormones out of whack again. Haven't had it happen for quite awhile now. drs.
Posts.Title: itching nipple
